**Arithmetic Operations**
```{r basic math}
a <- c(1,2,3,4,5)
b <- c(10,20,30,40,50)

a+100

a+b

(a+b)/10

c <- c(1:10)

c/100

c^2

c(1,2,3,4,5) + c(5,4,3,2,1)

a.bsum <- a+b
a.bdif <- a-b
a.bprod <- a*b


a.bsum
a.bdif
a.bprod

##pirate bake sale example 

pies <- c(3, 6, 2, 10, 4)
cookies <- c(70, 40, 40, 200, 60)

total.sold <- pies+cookies

total.sold 

```
**Summary Stats**
```{r summary stats}
tattoos <- c(4, 50, 2, 39, 4, 20, 4, 8, 10, 100)

min(tattoos)
max(tattoos)
mean(tattoos)
sd(tattoos)

a <- c(1:10)

length(a)

b <- seq(from=1,to=100, length.out=20)

length(b)

summary(b)

```
